DESCRIPTIONS: Die next turn. There is no escape.

DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot play any cards for #b

theRetrospect:TimeLoopPower.NAME: Time Loop
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards played by this timeline return to the timeline instead of exhausting.

DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Status card, gain #b

cards you play next turn are played twice.

cards you play this turn are played twice.
